import React, { useState } from 'react' import Navbar from '../components/Navbar' import Footer from '../components/Footer' import Box from '@mui/material/Box'; import Container from '@mui/material/Container'; import Typography from '@mui/material/Typography'; import { useContext } from 'react' import { UserContext } from '../App'; import Button from '@mui/material/Button'; import AddIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Add'; import '../App.css' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; //ver que pija pasa con la fuente que no anda si la pongo en App.css //ver display alert y next button //tengo que hacer display del error si clikceo next y me queda algun ejercicio con la prop day === '' otherwise /navigate(a next page) function DragExercises() { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [day, setDay] = useState('') const {list, setList} = useContext(UserContext); const [nextClick, setNextClick] = useState('') const [open, setOpen] = useState(true); const [greenExercises, setGreenExercises] = useState('') const handleClickDayButton = (id) => { setDay(id) console.log(day) } const hadleClickGreenButton = (movement, index) => { if (day) { const newList = {...list}; newList[movement][index].day = day setList(newList) console.log( newList[movement][index].day) } else { return } } const getCLickedItemsFromList = () => { const newList = {...list} setGreenExercises(newList) } const handleNextClick = () => { setNextClick(true) setOpen(true) for (let movement in list) { for (let i = 0; i < list[movement].length; i++) { if (list[movement][i].day === '') { } } } if (selectedExercises >= 1) { navigate('/DragExercises') } } return ( <> Select exercises {Object.keys(list).map(movement => {list[movement] .map((exercise, index) => exercise.isClicked && !exercise.day && )} )}

Friday
{Object.keys(list).map(movement => {list[movement] .map((exercise, index) => exercise.isClicked && exercise.day === 'friday' && )} )}
Saturday
{Object.keys(list).map(movement => {list[movement] .map((exercise, index) => exercise.isClicked && exercise.day === 'saturday' && )} )}
